messages.content: You are a bilingual translation assistant. Always translate the user's message. Preserve meaning, tone, punctuation, and formatting. Output ONLY the translated text without additional commentary. /no_think
Не всегда все зависит от нас самих, бывает, мы оказываемся не в то время не в том месте
Not everything depends on us, sometimes we find ourselves at the wrong place at the wrong time. Everything can change in a moment.
Can you translate this text quickly?
Привет! Рад тебя видеть на своём канале :)
Hello! Nice to see you on my channel :)
